title: Fundamentals Of Optics - 4th Edition.pdf Gooner
description:
Paperback: 768 pages
Publisher: McGraw-Hill Science/Engineering/Math; 4 edition (December 3, 2001)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0072561912
ISBN-13: 978-0072561913

This book has stood the test of time as one of the classic textbooks of physics. "Fundamentals of Optics" covers all of the main points of optics in a very consistently clear and concise manner. The book is well-illustrated. Each chapter has a set of largely numerical problems with answers provided for the odd numbered problems.
